M-Plate content
Model Type 2 (T1) mod. 211 :
- Panel van
- Cargo doors right
- LHD
Chassis number 1301843
Serial number 211301843
Modelyear 1964
Planned production date May 19 ,1964
Paint color
L87 - Pearl White
Interior color (doorpanels and seats) 80 - Grey
Destination USA, St. Louis



M-CODES
M-CODE Description Concerned models From chassis number To chassis number
025 US-spec bumpers and 6 pop-out windows -
025 Mountinf for safety belts -
425 North American export package including :
- Twin reverse lights
- Compteur en Miles
- Sealed beam headlights
- Hazard warning lights
- Mounting for safety belts in driver's and passenger's compartment
- Laminated windscreen
- Ram protection (bumper with guards)
- Dual-circuit brake system -
620 12v system (standard from August, 1966) -
621 12v warning light relay Except Ambulance
